title: Here is a curated reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 that explore the use of prosody in natural language processing (NLP) and its various applications
**"Prosody and its Application in Natural Language Processing"** - This article provides an overview of prosody and its significance in NLP
**"Prosodic Features and Their Role in Sentence Processing"** - Examines how prosodic features influence sentence comprehension in NLP systems
**"Using Prosody to Improve Automatic Speech Recognition"** - Discusses methods for incorporating prosodic information to enhance speech recognition accuracy
Authors: Mari Ostendorf
**"Prosody-Based Automatic Segmentation of Speech into Sentences and Topics"** - Explores techniques for using prosody to segment speech into meaningful units
Authors: Elizabeth Shriberg, Andreas Stolcke, and Don Hindle
**"The Role of Prosody in Disambiguating Syntactic Ambiguities"** - Investigates how prosodic cues can help resolve syntactic ambiguities in spoken language
**"Prosody in Automatic Dialogue Systems: An Overview"** - Reviews the use of prosody in designing and improving automatic dialogue systems
**"Prosodic Modeling in Speech Synthesis"** - Focuses on the integration of prosodic features in speech synthesis systems
Authors: Alan W
**"Prosody-Based Emotion Recognition in Spoken Language"** - Discusses how prosodic features can be used to detect emotions in speech
Authors: Björn Schuller
**"Using Prosody to Enhance Spoken Language Understanding"** - Examines the role of prosody in improving spoken language understanding systems
**"Prosody and Pragmatics in Spoken Dialogue Systems"** - Explores the interplay between prosody and pragmatics in dialogue systems
**"Prosodic Features for Speaker Recognition"** - Investigates the use of prosodic features in speaker recognition systems
Authors: Tomi Kinnunen and Haizhou Li
**"Prosody in Language Modeling for Speech Recognition"** - Discusses the incorporation of prosodic information in language models for speech recognition
Authors: Mari Ostendorf and Sunil Kumar
**"Prosody-Based Detection of Deceptive Speech"** - Explores how prosodic cues can be used to detect deception in spoken language

publisher: Julia Hirschberg, Stefan Benus, and Frank Enos

title: **"Prosody in Multimodal Human-Computer Interaction"** - Reviews the role of prosody in multimodal interaction systems
Authors: Elisabeth André and Thomas Rist
**"Prosody and Turn-Taking in Spoken Dialogue Systems"** - Investigates how prosodic features influence turn-taking behavior in dialogue systems
Authors: Nigel G
**"Prosody-Based Sentence Boundary Detection"** - Discusses methods for using prosody to detect sentence boundaries in speech
Authors: Elizabeth Shriberg and Andreas Stolcke
**"Prosody in Text-to-Speech Synthesis"** - Focuses on the integration of prosodic features in text-to-speech synthesis systems
Authors: Alan W
**"Prosodic Features in Automatic Speech Summarization"** - Explores the use of prosodic cues in automatic speech summarization systems
Authors: Ani Nenkova and Kathleen McKeown
**"Prosody and Discourse Structure in Spoken Language"** - Investigates the relationship between prosody and discourse structure in spoken language
**"Prosody and Language Learning in NLP Applications"** - Reviews the role of prosody in language learning applications within NLP
Authors: Helen Meng and Pascale Fung
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the various ways in which prosody is utilized in NLP and its applications across different domains
